<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
            <string language="es">Energía</string>
            <string language="ga">Fuinneamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A multiple chopice quiz to test your knowledge of Energy and related topics.</string>
            <string language="es">Un cuestionario con múltiples opciones para comprobar tus conocimientos sobre energía y temas relacionados.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gceist le rogha freaggraí le d’eolas ar Fhuinneamh agus topaicí bainteacha a thástáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein mehrfacher chopice Quiz, zum Ihres Wissens 
von Energie und von in Verbindung stehenden Themen zu prüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu multiple de chopice pour tester votre 
connaissance d'énergie et des sujets relatifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz múltiplo do chopice para testar seu 
conhecimento da energia e de tópicos relacionados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quiz multiplo di chopice per verificare la 
vostra conoscenza di energia e dei soggetti relativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας πολλαπλάσιος διαγωνισμός γνώσεων chopice για 
να εξετάσει τη γνώση σας ενέργειας και σχετικών θεμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
